tool_description: Buy bulk phone numbers for SMS verification/activation.
name: Bulk US phone numbers
title: Bulk US phone numbers

api_list.name: Check status

required_parameters.name: api
required_parameters.description: Set api=status to check if any SMS is received.

api_list.name: Get a number for a service
api_list.description: To get a new US number for a service/app.

required_parameters.name: services
required_parameters.description: Select services=facebook for getting a number for facebook.

required_parameters.name: api
required_parameters.description: Put api=new for getting a new US phone number.
